com.versant.fund
Interface AttrShort

All Superinterfaces:
Attr, java.lang.Cloneable
public interface AttrShort
extends Attr

Attr helper for Java type: short and Short.

Method Summary

          Casts a signed short to an unsigned Short.

SelectBuilder.select()

asUnsignedShort

AttrShort asUnsignedShort()
Casts a signed short to an unsigned Short.

This method can be used with select() and cursorSelect() to enable you to query unsigned data stored in a VERSANT database by an interface other than JVI.
